sense.def:
Oseba ali stvar, ki je
peculiar
, je nenavadna in včasih precej neprijetna.

seg.quote: He was wearing a peculiar suit.
She gave him a peculiar look.
Molly is behaving rather peculiarly these days.

sense.def:
To feel peculiar
pomeni, da je nekomu nekoliko slabo ali pa je omotičen.

seg.quote: Seeing blood makes me feel a bit peculiar inside.

sense.def:
Kadar je nekaj
peculiar to a particular thing or person
, pripada samo tej stvari ali osebi ali je značilno samo zanjo.

seg.quote: ...the style of decoration peculiar to the late 1920s.
It's an idiom that people recognise as peculiarly English.
